borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Removal of Condition 12 of planning permission reference: 2017/02530/FUL dated 13th September 2017 for the "Change of use of the front part of ground floor level from restaurant (Class A3) into retail (Class A1); change of use of the basement and rear part of ground floor level from restaurant (Class A3) into a three bedroom self-contained residential flat (Class C3); erection of a rear roof extension; erection of a rear extension at third floor level, on top of the existing back addition; installation of 3no rooflights in the front roofslope; further excavation of the existing basement, erection of rear extensions at basement and ground floor level including the formation of new rear lightwells following the demolition of existing ground floor back addition and outbuilding; erection of an external staircase from basement to ground floor level at the rear of the property; installation of new windows to replace the existing windows and door at the rear elevation of the building; alterations to existing shopfront to include the installation of two new entrance doors; conversion of the first, second and third floor level to provide 1 x one bedroom and 1 x three bedroom self-contained flats", to allow the occupiers of 2no. residential units and 1no. retail unit to be entitled to a car parking permit from the Council to park upon the public highway within the local controlled parking zone.
